projects.name: Skyfall - Enterprise System Replacement
projects.description: Led the replacement of JDE with a new system supporting parameterized products, software as a service, data as a service, agency integration, and developer ecosystem readiness. Delivered 80% process efficiency improvement through AI-powered solutions.

projects.name: Treadstone - Mobile & Web Analytics Platform
projects.description: Rebuilt mobile and web applications into analytics engines and personal assistants to drive engagement. Created comprehensive analytics platform with real-time insights and user engagement optimization.

projects.name: Alexa - Benefits STP with Machine Learning
projects.description: Implemented a benefits straight-through process powered by machine learning, automating benefit claims processing and reducing manual intervention by 80%. Integrated with Microsoft AI solutions for enhanced accuracy.

projects.name: Thunderball - Multi-Payment Platform
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive payment platform accepting various payment methods and agent networks for both incoming and outgoing transactions. Integrated multiple payment gateways and blockchain solutions including Bitcoin.

projects.name: Abatis - Knowledge Management System
projects.description: Foster internal customer self-service powered by democratization of knowledge and search. Created knowledge base for ITOs & Specialists and self-service capabilities.

projects.name: Digital Asset Portfolio Management
projects.description: Managed multi-million dollar digital asset strategies across Stablecoins, Layer 1/2 (Ethereum, Solana), DeFi, and RWAs. Delivered consistent double-digit returns through systematic risk management and AI-driven sentiment analysis.
